## Role & Contributions

Served as a quantitative research assistant for UNC Addressing the Social Contexts and Environments of Drinking (ASCEND) research group. Conducted an exploratory analysis of drinking motives and the use of harm reduction strategies. Transformed and analyzed cross-sectional survey and ecological momentary assessment (EMA) data. Drafted academic manuscripts on the topic of young adult engagement in alcohol consumption harm reduction strategies in various physical and social contexts.
